name: Create Remote User
description: A feature to assert the configured remote user exists in the container and optionally add them to additional groups

create.description: Create the user if it doesn't exist

addToSudo.description: If the user is newly created, add it to group sudo (if it exists)

installSudo.description: Install sudo if it is not yet installed

passwordLessSudo.description: Configures sudo to allow the remote user to elevate permissions without password

additionalGroups.description: Comma-separated list of additional groups to add the user to (e.g., 'audio,video,docker')
